traits.name: (Lurker) Cunning Action
traits.detail: You can Dash, Disengage, or Hide as a bonus action.

actions.name: Vanish
actions.detail: If she is not already invisible, Nemosyne becomes invisible until the end of her next turn.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.detail: Nemosyne teleports to an unoccupied space she can see within 60'.

actions.name: Damning Blight
actions.detail: One creature within 30' of Nemosyne must make a [dc-primary] CON save or take 36 (8d8) necrotic damage (half damage on save). If the target fails by 5 or more, they also have disadvantage on their next saving throw or attack roll.

actions.name: Bite
actions.detail: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ [attack] vs AC. _Hit:_ 10 (2d4+4) piercing damage, plus 21 (6d6) necrotic damage, and Nemosyne heals hp equal to the necrotic damage dealt.

actions.name: Entrancing Curse
actions.detail: A creature Nemosyne touches must make a [dc-primary] WIS save or become cursed (save ends). While cursed in this way, the target has disadvantage on attack rolls against Nemosyne.

actions.name: Consuming Darkness (recharge 5/6)
actions.detail: Nemosyne becomes invisible, and every living creature within 30' of her must make a [dc-primary] CON save or take [33, d10] psychic damage.
